IndicatorDescription: Voice and Accountability captures perceptions of the extent to which a country's citizens are able to participate in selecting their government, as well as freedom of expression, freedom of association, and a free media.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: The Composite Fragile States Index quantifying the overal fragility or vulnerability of a given country. See the linked documentation for more details.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the fragile states index, The economic inequality indicator considers inequality within the economy, irrespective of the actual performance of an economy. For example, the Indicator looks at structural inequality that is based on group (such as racial, ethnic, religious, or other identity group) or based on education, economic status, or region (such as urban-rural divide). It also takes into account perceived inequalities that can cause grievences among vulnerable populations.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A component of the Fragile States Index, the Security Apparatus metric considers the security threats to a state, such as bombings, attacks and battle-related deaths, rebel movements, mutinies, coups, or terrorism.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the Fragile States Index, the Factionalized Elites indicator considers the fragmentation of state institutions along ethnic, class, clan, racial or religious lines, as well as and brinksmanship and gridlock between ruling elites.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the Fragile States Index, the Group Grievance Indicator focuses on divisions and schisms between different groups in society. This includes historic opression, uneven distribution of resources, communal violence, etc.
SSTopics: States capabilities to deliver Gender Equality
Data for Social Norms change and Innovative Policies

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A composite measure in the Fragile States Index measuring a country's economic fragility

IndicatorDescription: External Peace

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the Fragile States Index quantifying the perceived openness of a government by its citizens accounting for mass demonstrations, sustained civil disobedience, and the rise of armed insurgencies.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the Fragile States Index, the Public Services indicator measures the presence of publics services such as clean water, access to health care, accesible housing, roads, and other essential infrastructure.

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A composite metric used in the Fragile States Index measuring the degree to which human rights and rule of law are respected and observed in a country

Goal: Governments ensure to “leave no one behind (LNOB)”
IndicatorDescription: A sub-component of the Fragile States Index quantifying the degree of population and demographic-related pressures on a state such as high population density, disease prevalence, birth rate, etc.

Indicator: Refugees and IDPs Pressure on State
